dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: An ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, used to construct datasets for training and evaluation in the study.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech ASR corpus

dcterms:creator: Robin Scheibler
Eric Bezzam
Ivan Dokmanić
dcterms:description: A Python package for audio room simulation and array processing algorithms, used to generate Room Impulse Responses (RIRs) for the study.
dcterms:title: RIRs (Room Impulse Responses)

dcterms:creator: Philipp Götz
Cagdas Tuna
Andreas Walther
Emanuël A.P. Habets
dcterms:description: Dataset containing acoustic parameters such as reverberation time (RT60) and clarity index (C50), used for regression tasks in the study.
dcterms:title: Acoustic parameters (RT60 and C50)

dcterms:creator: Albert S. Bregman
dcterms:description: A general reference for acoustic scene analysis datasets, providing foundational concepts and methodologies in the field.
dcterms:title: Acoustic scene analysis datasets (general reference)
